featured.title: CHIP-8 Emulator
featured.description: A basic CHIP-8 interpreter written in rust, attempting to emulate the original COSMAC VIP interpreter. Also includes a very elementary assembler in python, to create ROMs from plaintext hex.

featured.title: sci-calc
featured.description: An easy to use, fully functional scientific calculator library and CLI. Uses syntax parsing for robust and elegant error handling. Also features comprehensive built-in functions, variable recall, and more.

featured.title: Docker Dash
featured.description: Docker Dash is a handy GUI dashboard made for administrators to manage users' apps running as docker containers on a server. I wrote the backend for this project while interning at the Applied Research Laboratory at Univeristy of Hawai'i

other.title: Word Searcher
other.description: Brute force word search solver, made with Python
